name: FreeMind
description: FreeMind is a practical mind mapping software that can help you organize your open thinking and chaotic thoughts. It shows themes of all levels in mutually subordinated levels by the graphical and structured idea, which makes workflow more clearer and facilitates the whole team to work more efficiently.

en_US.description: FreeMind is a practical mind mapping software that can help you organize your open thinking and chaotic thoughts. It shows themes of all levels in mutually subordinated levels by the graphical and structured idea, which makes workflow more clearer and facilitates the whole team to work more efficiently.
en_US.name: FreeMind

zh_CN.description: FreeMind是一款实用的思维导图软件，它可以用来帮助您整理发散的思维、混乱的思绪。freemind通过将思路图形化、结构化，把各级主题用相互隶属的层级表示出来，工作流程更加清晰，方便整个团队更高效的开展工作。
zh_CN.name: FreeMind
